title: Charge on each sphere after wire is removed

content.description: The two conducting spheres shown above each initially have a net positive charge <math alttext="positive Q" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mstyle><mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>Q</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>.
